archimate:Resource.name: Dynamic Assembler
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB is responsible for invoking the appropriate end-point that needs to serve the request based on the context. Context provides the extra information that this ABB needs to make the intelligent decisions on which end-point is to be invoked.

properties.value: This ABB is responsible for invoking the appropriate end-point that needs to serve the request based on the context. Context provides the extra information that this ABB needs to make the intelligent decisions on which end-point is to be invoked.
